title: Explainable transformer-based models for Alzheimers's disease detection
description: Developing explainability solutions for transformer-based models to detect Alzheimers's disease from speech and text data.

title: LLM-Driven Knowledge Graph Framework for Personalized Cognitive-Impairment Care
description: An evidence-based, explainable AI system that unifies dispersed patient data into a validated knowledge graph to extract risk factors and generate individualized, guideline-aligned care plans.

title: Multimodal Video and Speech Data Collection for Cognitive Assessment
description: This project collects high-quality multimodal data—including video-based gaze and gait patterns, as well as spoken-language samples such as scripted sentence reading—to support advanced analysis of human behavior, mobility, and speech characteristics for clinical or AI research applications.
